# Ward House (Westfield, New York)

| locmapin     = New York#USA

Ward House, also known as the William Allen House, is a historic home located at Westfield in Chautauqua County, New York. It is a 2-story, L-shaped brick Italian Villaâ€“style residence built in the late 1860s.  The home features a prominent cupola, and the property has a -story frame barn.
It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983.
